item.title: Connecting to MAMP install of MySQL in R
item.description: In the course of doing a web dev tutorial (namely Tania Rasciaâ€™s great post on building a simple CRUD app) I had to install MAMP. This gives you a local server environment consisting of Apache, MySQL, and PHP.
